channel.title: humans.txt on Jesstern
channel.description: Recent content in humans.txt on Jesstern

item.title: Add a humans.txt file to your site
item.description: A humans.txt file contains information about the different people who have contributed to building the website. Have a look at the humans.txt pages by Medium and Trello. I think Netflix has a very cool humans.txt page. This website also has a humans.txt page.
